title: VEGAS Pro Suite 21 - Integrated video and audio editing tools for content creators | video editing software | video cutting software | video editor | Windows 10/11 PC | 1 license
description: VEGAS Pro Suite 21 - Integrated video and audio editing tools for content creators

Create captivating videos and outstanding audio with VEGAS Pro Suite. With advanced features like HDR color correction and grading, AI-assisted editing, masking, compositing, and striking visual effects, you can take your videos to the next level. Use SOUND FORGE Audio Studio for detailed audio work and sound design and create custom music soundtracks with ACID Music Studio--even if you’re not a musician! Build cinematic atmospheres through chroma key composites with Academy Award-nominated Boris FX Primatte Studio and use powerful Mocha VEGAS for top-notch motion tracking results. So why wait? Dive into the world of video and audio production and bring your ideas to life with VEGAS Pro Suite.

• Edit video & audio with intuitive and powerful tools• Choose from a wide array of powerful effects, filters, transitions & titles• Work with layers and masks to achieve professional compositing results• Create original custom transitions and effects with Adjustment Events and the new Offset and Wrap OFX plug-in and GL transitions• Apply powerful color grading and LUTs to create the perfect look for your project• Upscale your video and repair problematic footage fast with AI-powered tools
